notes.note: servicemesh-operator: NetworkPolicy resources incorrectly specify ports for ingress resources

reference.description: bz#1967738: CVE-2021-3586 servicemesh-operator: NetworkPolicy resources incorrectly specify ports for ingress resources

remediation.description:
The OpenShift Service Mesh Release Notes provide information on the features and
known issues:
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/latest/service_mesh/v2x/servicemesh-release-notes.html

acknowledgment.description: This issue was discovered by Simon Reber (Red Hat).

note:
An update for servicemesh-operator is now available for OpenShift Service Mesh 2.0.
Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Important. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.

Red Hat OpenShift Service Mesh is Red Hat's distribution of the Istio service mesh project, tailored for installation into an on-premise OpenShift Container Platform installation.
Security Fix(es):
* servicemesh-operator: NetworkPolicy resources incorrectly specify ports for ingress resources (CVE-2021-3586)
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
